markdown:
**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 136 2.0 **Prerequisites** Trained in [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9); [Debilitating Strike](/Classes.aspx?ID=10) --- Your attacks slice arteries and veins. Add the following debilitation to the list you can choose from when you use Debilitating Strike.
  • **Debilitation** The target takes 3d6 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29).
name: Bloody Debilitations
